tool_name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
tool_description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.

api_list.name: Onyomi reading
api_list.description: Retrieve the Onyomi reading of a kanji character using Katakana or romaji.

required_parameters.name: on
required_parameters.description: Katakana or romaji representation of the kanji reading.

api_list.name: Kunyomi reading
api_list.description: Retrieve the Kunyomi reading of a kanji character using Hiragana or romaji.

required_parameters.name: kun
required_parameters.description: Hiragana or romaji representation of the kanji reading.

api_list.name: Kanji English meaning
api_list.description: Retrieve the English meaning of a kanji character.

required_parameters.name: kem
required_parameters.description: Simplified English meaning of the kanji.

api_list.name: Kanji stroke number
api_list.description: Retrieve kanji characters based on the number of strokes.

required_parameters.name: ks
required_parameters.description: Positive integer representing the number of strokes.

api_list.name: Radical English meaning
api_list.description: Retrieve the English meaning of a kanji radical.

api_list.name: Radical position
api_list.description: Retrieve radicals based on their position in the kanji.

required_parameters.name: rpos
required_parameters.description: Hiragana or romaji representation of the radical's position.

api_list.name: Radical stroke number
api_list.description: Retrieve radicals based on the number of strokes.

required_parameters.name: rs
required_parameters.description: Positive integer representing the number of strokes.

api_list.name: Study list (AP exam)
api_list.description: Retrieve kanji divided into chapters for the AP exam.

required_parameters.name: list
required_parameters.description: Kanji divided into chapters (1-20) by Kanji alive.

api_list.name: Study list (Macquarie)
api_list.description: Retrieve kanji divided into chapters for the Macquarie study list.

api_list.name: Kanji grade level
api_list.description: Retrieve kanji based on their grade level.

required_parameters.name: grade
required_parameters.description: Positive integer representing the grade level.

api_list.name: All Kanji Details
api_list.description: Retrieve language attributes and media files for all supported kanji.
